tool.name: SAGA.grid_analysis.17
tool.description: Fragmentation Classes from Density and Connectivity
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDENSITY False isArrayCONNECTIVITY False output_data_FRAGMENTATION $output_data_FRAGMENTATION name SAGA.grid_analysis.17 DENSITY $DENSITY CONNECTIVITY $CONNECTIVITY BORDER $BORDER WEIGHT $WEIGHT DENSITY_MIN $DENSITY_MIN DENSITY_INT $DENSITY_INT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FRAGMENTATION $OutputSection_FRAGMENTATION.outputType_FRAGMENTATION transmissionMode_FRAGMENTATION $OutputSection_FRAGMENTATION.transmissionMode_FRAGMENTATION

param.name: DENSITY
param.label: Density [Percent]
param.help: Density Index (Pf). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: CONNECTIVITY
param.label: Connectivity [Percent]
param.help: Connectivity Index (Pff). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: DENSITY_INT
param.label: Minimum Density for Interior Forest [Percent]
param.help: if less than 100, it is distinguished between interior and core forest

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FRAGMENTATION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Fragmentation classes:<br/>(1) interior, if Density = 1.0<br/>(2) undetermined, if Density > 0.6 and Density = Connectivity<br/>(3) perforated, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity > 0<br/>(4) edge, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity < 0<br/>(5) transitional, if 0.4 < Density < 0.6<br/>(6) patch, if Density < 0.4<br/>
